DOC.brief_title: Chronic Kidney Disease Antidepressant Sertraline Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This randomized double-blinded placebo-controlled trial adult predialysis stag 3-5 Chronic Kidney Disease Major Depressive Episode . Subjects randomize double-blind fashion placebo sertraline ( begin 50 mg/d escalate 50 mg increment every 2 week maximum 200 mg/d ) follow 12 week . The primary outcome investigate treatment sertraline , compare placebo , result improvement depression symptom severity measure Quick Inventory Depressive Symptomatology Clinician Rated ( QIDS-C-16 ) score . Secondary outcome include whether sertraline , compare placebo , improve overall function quality life whether result serious adverse event .
